meta.name: description
meta.content: Welcome to Washington Public Schools. Home of the Warriors. Washington Public Schools is located in McClain County. The Washington Warriors have a proud tradition of excellence in academics and extra-curricular activities.

div.p: Welcome to Washington Public Schools. Home of the Warriors. Washington Public Schools is located in McClain County. The Washington Warriors have a proud tradition of excellence in academics and extra-curricular activities. It’s always a great day to be a Warrior!
